blocks.text: North London Derby day — Arsenal go for the jugular at Spurs
Arsenal lead by 2 — a win today makes a title statement. Real Madrid fell to Osasuna yesterday, leaving Barcelona's path clearer with Levante next up tonight.

blocks.label: Must-Watch This Week
items: ⚽ Tue 21:00 — Bodø/Glimt carry a stunning 3-1 lead to Inter — Norway's greatest CL night
⛷️ Thu 13:00 — Nordic WCH opens in Trondheim — Weng, Fossesholm & Jacobsen in Women's Skiathlon
